name: The 5th Int'l Conference on Stem Cell Research and Therapy
content: The 5th Int'l Conference on Stem Cell Research and Therapy (SCRT 2024) will be held in Kunming, China, during May 28-30, 2024\. The aim of SCRT is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Stem Cell Apoptosis and Signal Transduction, Stem Cell Technologies,Cancer Stem Cells, Mesenchymal Stem Cells, etc. SCRT 2024 will be a valuable and important platform for inspiring international and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Stem Cell Research and Therapy.
